      all possible trigger for tooltip

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TooltipConfig withAnimation(boolean value)
      apply a css fade transition to the tooltip
      TooltipConfig withContent(String value)
      default content value if `data-content` attribute isn't present
      TooltipConfig withDelay(org.apache.wicket.util.time.Duration value)
      delay showing and hiding the tooltip (ms) - does not apply to manual trigger type

      Not implemented: If a number is supplied, delay is applied to both hide/show Object structure is: delay: { show: 500, hide: 100 }
      TooltipConfig withHtml(boolean value)
      Insert html into the tooltip.
      TooltipConfig withPlacement(TooltipConfig.IPlacement value)
      how to position the tooltip - top | bottom | left | right
      TooltipConfig withSelector(String value)
      If a selector is provided, tooltip objects will be delegated to the specified targets.
      TooltipConfig withTitle(String value)
      default title value if `title` tag isn't present
      TooltipConfig withTrigger(TooltipConfig.Trigger value)
      how tooltip is triggered - click | hover | focus | manual

      • withDelay

        public TooltipConfig withDelay(org.apache.wicket.util.time.Duration value)
        delay showing and hiding the tooltip (ms) - does not apply to manual trigger type

        Not implemented: If a number is supplied, delay is applied to both hide/show Object structure is: delay: { show: 500, hide: 100 }

        Parameters:
        value - mandatory parameter
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining.

      • withHtml

        public TooltipConfig withHtml(boolean value)
        Insert html into the tooltip. If false, jquery's text method will be used to insert content into the dom. Use text if you're worried about XSS attacks.
        Parameters:
        value - mandatory parameter
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining.
